column1: The same people who have spent years peddling the Russia hoax and claiming @realDonaldTrump is an illegitimate president are now telling us to just accept the unofficial election results that have shaken Americans' trust in our electoral system. https://t.co/mWXr3FQF1p

As we wait patiently for the official results of the 2020 election one thing is clear: millions of Americans have lost faith in our electoral system. That’s why I introduced the Protect Election Integrity Act of 2020.   Read about it here ➡️ https://t.co/zGldYrvLat
Thank you to all military service members and their families who have sacrificed so much to defend freedom and preserve our way of life in America. You are our nation’s heroes. Happy Veterans Day.
..and investigations into voting irregularities are ongoing. The winner of the election will be determined by the law not media projections.

In our representative republic it is not the media who declares the winner of elections. Right now @realDonaldTrump is engaged in several court cases to determine the integrity of the vote in multiple states. None of those states have officially certified their vote counts..
This is exactly right! https://t.co/3s0RaLqGir

Thank you western Pennsylvania! I am honored that you have chosen me to be your voice in our nation’s capital. Together we will keep fighting for freedom our values a brighter economic future for our families and a stronger more prosperous America.

Americans are the most resilient people on earth. They have risen up to rebuild an economy that was devastated by the pandemic. 33.1% 3rd quarter GDP growth proves @realDonaldTrump’s economic policies are rapidly putting us back on a path to prosperity!

The Senate just confirmed now-Justice Amy Coney Barrett to the Supreme Court! She will be a champion for our God-given rights by interpreting the law and Constitution as written. Thank you @POTUS for nominating such a qualified person to America's highest court. Also go Irish!
I guess Democrats just couldn't bring themselves to vote against such a qualified nominee! #ACB https://t.co/5IQmKseSys
The Democrat game plan: politics over people.   There is simply no excuse for this. https://t.co/xXpH35uoCD

Speaker Pelosi has routinely put politics over people. Americans need targeted pandemic relief but Democrats are holding it hostage so they can ram through their radical partisan agenda. Drop the games. Let’s get help to those who need it! https://t.co/7kpMbd1802
Pennsylvania workers are thriving because of @POTUS @realDonaldTrump’s energy policies! https://t.co/l4LIdEuVON

Ways & Means Democrats ignored the potentially criminal leak of @realDonaldTrump's taxes in a "taxpayer fairness" Oversight hearing yesterday. They chose political theater to attack @POTUS rather than reassure Americans that their tax info is secure. More: https://t.co/IGxevtIArU

MYTH: @POTUS @realDonaldTrump's #OperationWarpSpeed COVID-19 vaccine has been rushed and will be unsafe.  FACT: FDA approval means this vaccine will have met the same safety requirements as other drugs.  My friends in the Doctors Caucus explain more here ⬇️ https://t.co/PopWVFjdvG
I call on all western Pennsylvanians to join me in prayer for @realDonaldTrump and @FLOTUS as they battle COVID-19. They are tough and will bounce back stronger than ever!

As Ranking Member of the W&M Oversight Subcommittee it's my job to ensure your tax info is secure. That’s why I joined @RepKevinBrady to ask IRS & DOJ to probe the leak of @realDonaldTrump's taxes. If it can happen to @POTUS it can happen to anyone.  More➡️https://t.co/6ufL6KWT0M

PA has been locked down for 6 months. It's time to lift the ban on attending outdoor sports. Schools can implement safety guidelines Pennsylvanians can assess the risk. PA Republicans sent this letter to @GovernorTomWolf urging him to let PA watch sports in-person this fall! https://t.co/sfVJKEiqtJ

..shows no wrong doing by @POTUS but leaves Americans wondering if their own private tax information can be weaponized against them for political gain. There must be an investigation into who turned over confidential tax records to the press to determine if the law was broken.

The unethical perhaps illegal leaking of any American’s tax returns is a stunning breach of public trust. That doesn’t change because it happened to @realDonaldTrump. The joint political hit piece between the New York Times and Democrats just weeks before an election..

Judge Amy Coney Barrett is a brilliant legal mind an outstanding person and the right choice for the Supreme Court. @POTUS @realDonaldTrump has selected an imminently qualified conservative judge who will interpret the Constitution and the law with an originalist philosophy!

I just co-sponsored a bill to amend the Constitution to limit the size of SCOTUS to nine justices. Such an amendment would prevent partisans from following through on threats to "pack the court" i.e. move the goal posts because they’re upset about the timing of vacancies.

Great @PittsburghPG editorial on Gov. Wolf’s coronavirus orders being declared unconstitutional.  The Constitution is not a suggestion. Emergencies do not grant politicians unlimited authority to restrict rights even if the policies are well-intentioned.  https://t.co/tiHioh8F0F
This is the @HouseGOP #CommitmenttoAmerica:  To *Restore* our way of life. To *Rebuild* the greatest economy in history. To *Renew* the American dream.  https://t.co/TklIzqQMOo

Thank you @POTUS @realDonaldTrump for taking decisive executive action to help families pay their bills and get through this pandemic. Even as Democrats continue to play political games this administration and Congressional Republicans will go to bat for working Americans.
Happy birthday to @USCG which turns 230 years old today.   A special thank you to the men and women who are “Always Ready” at the Erie Station! https://t.co/EhvO8IWZwk

As someone who has donated plasma it's an easy way to make a big difference for someone in need. If you've recovered from COVID-19 consult your doctor about where you can donate and help save lives! https://t.co/vZywDH6Ai4
If you’ve had COVID-19 donating plasma can save lives. Talk with your doctor about how you can help. https://t.co/2eGIkI98KE

On this day in 1956 “In God We Trust” became America’s official national motto. Times like these should turn us back to this simple but powerful truth. We can get through political strife pandemics and other challenges with His help.
Great news! @POTUS @realDonaldTrump has once again demonstrated his commitment to western Pennsylvania with a @USDOT grant for Erie International Airport. https://t.co/FIb1UwEtjK

Our nation was made better because of John Lewis' fearless stand for equality with Dr. Martin Luther King. Mr. Lewis' time on Earth was well spent and touched all of us. I am honored to have served with him and to have called this great man a friend.

When we support small businesses like local music venues we’re supporting our communities. The #RESTART Act will build on the success of #PPP by helping companies survive and workers thrive during the COVID-19 pandemic.

Doctors and nurses need our support as they risk their own health to treat #COVID19 patients. I introduced the Essential Workforce Parity Act to extend paid medical leave to America's health care heroes if they get sick while caring for others. https://t.co/KiuC7tmZbg
A victory for religious freedom! https://t.co/5iLCY6JaoG

Great news today!  The U.S. economy added 4.8 million jobs in June and the unemployment rate fell from 13.3 percent to 11.1 percent.  This report is an incredible testimony to the country's resilience and our steady recovery!
Thank you to all our great soldiers that have defended freedom here at home and abroad. We appreciate you. https://t.co/5W5tLivm9C

It is one thing to call for police accountability which is needed but de-funding or abolishing police is nonsense. Most cops are great people who do a difficult job well. I stand with Americans who demand equal justice AND good officers who selflessly serve our communities.

Opportunity zones are helping revitalize western PA & they will help us through the economic devastation caused by coronavirus. Last month @RepRonKind & I urged @IRSNews to extend deadlines for OZ investment & I am thankful that @POTUS delivered!  https://t.co/ajb9HoJA5W

I was proud to join the Silent March in #EriePA today where people from every background united to bring us closer to America’s promise of one nation under God w/ liberty & justice for all. Read my full statement: https://t.co/eUQW8CikGS

76 years ago today American soldiers and other allied forces landed at Normandy in France to liberate Europe from Nazi tyranny. Thank you to these men and all others who have served and sacrificed in defense of freedom here at home and abroad. https://t.co/NabLQsKpR3

Some encouraging news for U.S. workers. The coronavirus wreaked havoc on the economy but we are already bouncing back.  Before this pandemic Americans had built the best economy in half a century and we will do it again!  https://t.co/TGlWQIkNrp

The death of #GeorgeFloyd is a tragedy. Our nation is right to mourn. I ask all western PA to unite in love of neighbor & to treat all people as we would like to be treated.  But riots are self-defeating & create more problems than they solve. Riot prevention is justice for all.

Sam Johnson was an American hero and among our greatest patriots. He served our country and the people of Texas selflessly - in the military and in Congress - and made a lasting impact on all of us. It was an honor to serve alongside him. He will be missed. https://t.co/MiPD5kUeTz

Who do we trust when it comes to our health? Medical professionals or @JoyVBehar? @POTUS @realDonaldTrump and I did what all Americans should do before taking Hydroxychloroquine - we sought the counsel of our trusted doctors. That's what "anybody with a brain" would do. https://t.co/agec1oIWXu

We are excited to welcome @POTUS @realDonaldTrump to the Commonwealth today & thankful for his support during the COVID-19 pandemic. PA has received:  ✅$300+ million for testing ✅$21.4 billion in SBA loans ✅2.6 million N-95 masks  ..and so much more from this administration.

“I just thought for me to give up a couple hours of my life to go and donate....what an easy way to maybe be part of a cure that the world is searching for right now.”  I spoke w/ @rollcall about my plasma donation to help those fighting #COVID19.   https://t.co/eQjaaK14mv

It’s been said that 90% of life is showing up because when you show up people know that you care. Thank you @POTUS @realDonaldTrump for making PA a priority. We have received millions for #COVID19 testing in our state critical PPE & other supplies. These actions saved lives!

The response to #COVID19 has been largely bipartisan until now but the Democrats' new $3 trillion bill is a progressive wish list that puts politics over people. They should work w/ Republicans & @POTUS not abuse the crisis to ram through their radical change America agenda.

I have been declared free of #COVID19 by doctors after testing negative for the virus & positive for antibodies last week. Thank you to everyone who prayed & sent well wishes for my recovery!  https://t.co/eAy1zbOu65

Happy #NationalNursesDay to all nurses. We are grateful for all that you are doing to help those struggling with COVID-19 and all you did before this pandemic and will do after it passes. Thanks for selflessly serving our families friends and neighbors!
